By controlling the vast chakra flowing from the {{translation|[[Source of the Ryūmyaku|Ryūmyaku]]|龍脈|lit meaning=Dragon Veins}}, the user is able to convert the [[chakra]] and use it in various ways including to power up an entire [[Rōran|city]] and control a large number of [[puppet]]s. If not stopped, the user would have an unlimited source of energy to feed off of.

While anyone can control an open flow of the Ryūmyaku for their own purposes, only those of the royal bloodline can open or close the flow.

== Trivia ==
* Mukade was able to use the chakra to accelerate his healing and transform his body in a similar way of a [[jinchūriki]] and their [[tailed beast]].
